messages.title: Demand Better Than Boris
messages.content: Boris Johnson's short stint as Prime Minister has been a disaster. We need a Prime Minister who will put our country's future first. Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are the positive difference Britain needs.

messages.title: Brexit Threatens Local Business
messages.content: Recently I visited a Marlborough business that produces a specialist resin which has to be transported in transport. Their business is threatened by Brexit. We must stop Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Climate change is threatening our future. We need urgent action and so far the Conservatives have been complacent.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Demanding better for physical and mental health
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives are putting the long-term future of the NHS at risk. We are also championing parity for mental health provision and support.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A brighter future for children with Special Educational Needs and Disability
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Demand for SEND support has not kept pace. The Liberal Democrats will ensure that these children get the education they need.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Liberal Democrats have won against the Conservatives in Wiltshire in 2019

issues.education: Demand for Special Educational Needs and Disability. Our vulnerable children are being let down.
issues.environment: We need urgent action to tackle the climate emergency.
issues.health: The Conservatives are putting the long-term future of the NHS at risk.

community.content: Jo Waltham lives locally and has the real life experience needed to be your MP.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a small business owner, web developer, wife and mother, I'm definitely not what you'd call a career politician but I understand the local issues that matter most to you.

examples: 1p ON INCOME TAX TO GIVE £7bn NHS FUNDING.

60 MILLION TREES TO BE PLANTED PER YEAR.
